item.title: Menu Problems
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

I have a problem; I made it so if you do a command, it teles you and it opens up a menu. But the menu opens up for a split second then goes away.

Here is the code.

[code]
public void WritePest()
{

setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
sendQuest("@red@Pest Control!", 15894);
sendQuest("@red@To enter a game", 15895);
sendQuest("@red@Go up to the boat", 15897);
sendQuest("@red@stand next to the", 15898);
sendQuest("@red@gangplank to enter", 15899);
sendQuest("@red@& then wait!", 15900);
sendQuest("@red@Points: @gre@"+points, 15901);
sendQuest("", 15896);
sendQuest("", 15902);
sendQuest("", 15903);
sendQuest("", 15904);
sendQuest("", 15905);
sendQuest("", 15906);

}[/code]

Read full topic
